Title: Castle Leoch
Writer: Diana Gabaldon (based on the series of books written by), Ronald D. Moore (developed by), Ronald D. Moore (written for television by)
Actors: Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Tobias Menzies, Gary Lewis
Plot: Claire is brought to Castle Leoch under suspicion as an English spy. Learning that the year is 1743, she tries to arrange travel back to the standing stones. Colum MacKenzie uses her ability as a healer as an excuse to detain her.
